Desc.entry: Part of Sheffield Libraries, Archives and Information. Special function is to facilitate access to library and information services for those people unable to use a building based service. All services are outreach, working with communities and with individuals. There are 5 mobile library vehicles stocked with up to 2,500 titles for young children and families, adults and people with visual impairment. Books, talking books and DVDs available. All the mobile library vehicles have step lifts. The Housebound Service includes materials for adults, with a large selection of books in large print and on tape, jigsaws, videos, music casettes and CD's. Homelink newsletter free to readers. Monthly delivery and collection door to door.

ProviderServiceDetails.entry: No personal callers, please contact by telephone, email or letter only
